Applications of IRT in building assessment:
Explanation of InfraRed Thermography and its principles.
Increasing concern for climate change and its impact on building structures.
Emerging inspection technologies for building assessment.
Importance of building assessment for structural safety, energy efficiency, user well-being, and heritage preservation.

Building assessment plays a crucial role in ensuring the structural safety, energy efficiency, user well-being, and heritage preservation of buildings. In recent years, there has been a growing interest in utilizing advanced technologies such as InfraRed Thermography (IRT) and Ground-Penetrating Radar (GPR) for building assessment purposes. This review article aims to provide a comprehensive analysis of the applications, benefits, and challenges associated with the use of IRT and GPR in building assessment.
